column5: I've been watchin' SEVERAL boards for mention of the Spring Fishin' Show . . . .    not a whisper? After a relatively poor showing, and down-sized show last year, there were rumblings it MIGHT be the last one. Anybody out there have any info on this?

I've been going to the Spring Show since day 1 Steve and always enjoyed it, but last year was a real disappointment with what seemed like 1/2 the vendors not there anymore. I'll go again this year if they have one, but if it hasn't improved over last year, it'll be my last time.  The Sportsman Show has gone waaaaaaay downhill the last few years too, so maybe they should scrap them both, and come up with one big decent show at a decent price and maybe they'll get the interest back from the public
yep it is still on  here is the site  http://www.springfishingshow.com/site/  I already bought my ticket  troy
Photoz, yeah it's on, I was at LeB to pick up a few things on Boxing Day and they had coupons to save $1 off the admission.  Mike

Yup...  its still on...  WE will be doing our annual giving away of a bunch of tickets.. as usuall..  Ill wont have a booth this year, but I will be going down for the show all day saturday... thats the plan anyway!!

With the rising costs of expenses it is tough for exhibitors to come to the shows. Floor space is BIG $$ and the cost of employees, food travel and lodging many cannot afford the show. As for consumers, we are looking for the biggest bang for our buck and will wait sometimes before we purchase. Looking forward to the shows. Not only have the TO shows suffered but also the ones across Michigan that I have attended.

Leah got $1 off coupons for the Spring Show, from Bass Pro when she did her Christmas shopping in there. Guess it's their way of showing that they support it...while they have their own little "show" the same dates at the store! LOL  Feb 15, 16, 17 and 18th Steve!
TJ, not worth your while to have a booth this year?  Too bad, sounds like a trend over the past few years for these shows. I haven't been in a few years now...  Mike

Needless to say we were newly weds last year.... And still are this year, still in the heavy like zone.... I am looking forward to the Spring Show, hubby said it was the lowest he had ever seen.....Is there another possible place to put it, that would be alot lower price to set up booths..... Oh why not come out with a sticker we can wear, to identify each other at the show......  Lorissa
hey guys is there anyway u can volunteer to help?
